verses.verse: And the <S%H4397>angel<s%> that <S%H1696>talked<s%> with me <S%H7725>came<s%> <S%H7725>again,<s%> and <S%H5782>waked<s%> me, as a <S%H376>man<s%> that is <S%H5782>wakened<s%> out of his <S%H8142>sleep.<s%>

And <S%H559>said<s%> to me, <S%H4100>What<s%> <S%H7200>see<s%> you? And I <S%H559>said,<s%> I have <S%H7200>looked,<s%> and <S%H2005>behold<s%> a <S%H4501>candlestick<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> of <S%H2091>gold,<s%> with a <S%H1543>bowl<s%> on the <S%H7218>top<s%> of it, and his <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H5216>lamps<s%> <S%H5921>thereon,<s%> and <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H4166>pipes<s%> to the <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H5216>lamps,<s%> which are on the <S%H7218>top<s%> thereof:
And <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H2132>olive<s%> trees by it, <S%H259>one<s%> on the <S%H3225>right<s%> side of the <S%H1543>bowl,<s%> and the <S%H259>other<s%> on the <S%H8040>left<s%> side thereof.
So I <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>spoke<s%> to the <S%H4397>angel<s%> that <S%H1696>talked<s%> with me, <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H4100>What<s%> are <S%H428>these,<s%> my <S%H113>lord?<s%>

Then the <S%H4397>angel<s%> that <S%H1696>talked<s%> with me <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to me, <S%H3045>Know<s%> you not <S%H4100>what<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> be? And I <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3808>No,<s%> my <S%H113>lord.<s%>

Then he <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>spoke<s%> to me, <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H2088>This<s%> is the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> to <S%H2216>Zerubbabel,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> Not by <S%H2428>might,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> by <S%H3581>power,<s%> but by my <S%H7307>spirit,<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts.<s%>

<S%H4310>Who<s%> are you, O <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H2022>mountain?<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H2216>Zerubbabel<s%> you shall become a <S%H4334>plain:<s%> and he shall <S%H3318>bring<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> the <S%H68>headstone<s%> <S%H7222><s%> thereof with <S%H8663>shoutings,<s%> crying, <S%H2580>Grace,<s%> <S%H2580>grace<s%> to it.
Moreover the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> to me, <S%H559>saying,<s%>

The <S%H3027>hands<s%> of <S%H2216>Zerubbabel<s%> have laid the <S%H3248>foundation<s%> of <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1004>house;<s%> his <S%H3027>hands<s%> shall also <S%H1214>finish<s%> it; and you shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> has <S%H7971>sent<s%> me to you.

For <S%H4310>who<s%> has <S%H937>despised<s%> the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H6996>small<s%> things? for they shall <S%H8055>rejoice,<s%> and shall <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H68>plummet<s%> <S%H913><s%> in the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H2216>Zerubbabel<s%> with <S%H428>those<s%> <S%H7651>seven;<s%> they are the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> which <S%H7751>run<s%> to and <S%H7751>fro<s%> through the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H776>earth.<s%>

Then <S%H6030>answered<s%> I, and <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H4100>What<s%> are <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H2132>olive<s%> trees on the <S%H3225>right<s%> side of the <S%H4501>candlestick<s%> and on the <S%H8040>left<s%> side thereof?

And I <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H8145>again,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H4100>What<s%> be these <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H2132>olive<s%> <S%H7641>branches<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H3027>through<s%> the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H2091>golden<s%> <S%H6804>pipes<s%> <S%H7324>empty<s%> the golden oil out of themselves?
And he <S%H559>answered<s%> me and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3045>Know<s%> you not <S%H4100>what<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> be? And I <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3808>No,<s%> my <S%H113>lord.<s%>

Then <S%H559>said<s%> he, <S%H428>These<s%> are the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1121>anointed<s%> <S%H3323><s%> ones, that <S%H5975>stand<s%> by the <S%H113>LORD<s%> of the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H776>earth.<s%>
